name: The Honorable Gwendolyn N. Bright
assigned: PA - Philadelphia County Court of Common Pleas
bio:
The Hon. Gwendolyn N. Bright is a judge for the Philadelphia County Court of Common Pleas in Pennsylvania. She was elected to the bench in 1995 and re-elected in 2005 and 2015.

Prior to her election, Bright served as the deputy chief of the Mental Health Division of the Defender Association of Philadelphia.

Bright earned a B.A. from Delaware State College in 1972. She then completed a J.D. at Temple University James E. Beasley School of Law in 1976.
career: Mental Health Division of the Defender Association of Philadelphia
